item.title: Experiments Over Discussions
item.description: Remember the last time you had a long, heated discussion and found a perfect solution? Me neither. Wouldn’t it be amazing to have a better way to resolve arguments? I recall a particularly exhausting discussion that went on for over a month. Long ago I worked on large scale distributed system. At some point we found a potential issue that could lead to lost updates in our data sets.
